NOMBRE DE CORPS = 4096

MPI-OPENMP
==========

1 machine  (4  threads) => 0,049387 sec
2 machines (8  threads) => 0,014801 sec
4 machines (16 threads) => 0,010785 sec

===

4  machines             => 0,052735 sec

16 machines 		=> 0,012062 sec
